title: Interpretation of seeing coal in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing coal in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Charcoal is the state in which tree wood arrives after sitting in the ground for years and being exposed to high pressure and heat. Coal is used for many different purposes, and it is one of the rare dreams that occur in certain periods of transitional life, to reflect some of the feelings and thoughts that are circulating in the mind of the fortuneteller. In this article, we will learn together about his interpretation of See collecting coal in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of why do you see coal? In a dream, interpretation of Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin said about coal: He said that coal comes from trees and shows the danger of a young man and causing trouble. Coal in a dream indicates food from a forbidden place that brings disaster and illness to its owner. From it comes coal (ash), and ash is a very stinky and harmful thing. Which indicates great evil and apparent and secret abominations. As for there are types of coal that people use and benefit from, it is (fuel), and the dreamer’s goodness appears in his work and life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing coal in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is collecting lumps of coal and doing useful work with them, then this Evidence that the dreamer has been gifted by God Almighty with his abundant provision and his finger that benefits people and God. He knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing coal ash in a dream: Ashes are unpleasant in a dream. Ashes are money, forbidden food, serious distress that befalls the dreamer. Whoever sees in his dream that he is reading a book and ash appears in his eyes, this is evidence that the dreamer will do work that he will not benefit from, or study that will not benefit him. He will succeed in it. Whoever sees in his dream that ash has fallen into his eye, making him unable to see, this is evidence that he will marry a woman who is neither good nor kind in herself (and God knows best). Interpretation of a dream about seeing coal burning in a dream. Burning coal in a dream is from Things that portend good. Whoever sees in his dream that coal is burning inside his house, this indicates the great and extensive livelihood that God gives to the dreamer. Whoever sees in his dream that coal is burning next to him, this is evidence that the dreamer will give him money and gold, God willing. Burning coal in a dream It indicates a great position and that the dreamer will become a source of great concern and reach the highest positions. But whoever sees in his dream that the burning ember has been extinguished, this is evidence that the dreamer will go through a difficult period with many problems and consequences, and God knows best. At the end of our article, we explain to you that coal is one of Things that have many interpretations and interpretations, but in the end everything is in the knowledge of God. Seeing coal or ashes is an unpleasant dream that can portend loss, loss or the end of things that a person has been trying to keep for a long time, but there are some other positive interpretations that They are inferred from other details in the dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a golden ring in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a gold ring in a dream Seeing a gold ring in a dream indicates many meanings for the dreamer who does not like gold and wears it, and we also find that its high price is an important means of saving, but we see that it differs in the dream according to its shape and the places where it was found, whether he bought it, sold it or swallowed it, so we understand each definition in order to reach the accurate interpretation, all this after our article. What is the interpretation of a dream about a gold ring? The gold ring in a dream carries many meanings. If the dreamer sees it and is happy, it expresses comfort and satisfaction, and if he takes it from his hand, this is a sign of escaping from the anxiety and pain that controls him. Swallowing it in a dream is clear evidence of the greed that distinguishes the dreamer, who must stay away from his possessions permanently, and in this bad way. Removing it is an expression of distancing from friends and not getting close to them, or perhaps if the dreamer is attached, this leads to the final termination of this relationship. If it is black, this indicates the distress he is exposed to in his life because he is exposed to bad things that bother him at every moment through a person he trusts and does not deserve that Trust. As for the white color, it is evidence of the amount of goodness inside the dreamer and that he achieves his goals with his good treatment and kindness to others, so his financial condition is at its best and he does not live in material injustice, whatever it is. If there is a red color in the ring lobe, this is an expression of his great success in dealing with the partner, and there is no doubt that this color shows happy feelings and emotions from every side. There is no doubt that the gold ring is expensive, but if it is equipped with diamonds, this makes it more expensive, so if the dreamer sees it in this way, it shows the great luxury in which he lives and the endless prosperity. Seeing a small ring is a clear indication of the good news that will soon await the dreamer and the wonderful opportunities that he will face in his life. If the dreamer suffers from this, this is an expression of the extent of the tension he feels, as he goes through several situations in which he cannot choose the good quickly. What is the interpretation of the dream of the golden ring according to Ibn Sirin? Our great Imam Ibn Sirin explains to us in the interpretation of the dream of the golden ring, where it indicates these important concepts, which are: Swallowing it is an interpretation of keeping a big secret that he does not want anyone to know, or that he has a lot of money to save and does not want the people closest to him to know how much he saves and where he puts it. If the ring gets stuck in his throat without him being able to swallow it, this means that he is in a crisis that weakens him and he cannot reveal it to anyone, so he does not reveal it or hide it in himself. It causes him great sadness and mental fatigue. Seeing him as an older person does not express malice, but rather indicates the loyal people present in the dreamer's life. This friendship again cannot be replaced, so no matter what happens, he must not lose it. As for if it is made of gold but rusty, this indicates the amount of neglect that characterizes the dreamer in his life. Neglect cannot lead to success and development, but rather leads to collapse. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about ablution that Ibn Sirin did not complete?

preview.html: The ablution through which a Muslim purifies and purifies the body in preparation for prayer, and ablution in a dream has many connotations, so we will discuss today. The interpretation of a dream about ablution is not complete, for single, married, and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream about ablution, and Ibn Sirin did not complete it. What is the interpretation of a dream about ablution that is not completed? Incomplete ablution in The dream is evidence that the dreamer intended to do something, but did not complete it due to a series of obstacles that suddenly appeared. title: Interpretation of seeing eyeliner in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of Al-Ain Al-Nabulsi’s vision. Al-Nabulsi says: Whoever sees himself in a dream wearing black eyeliner, then he will approach God and reform his religion, and God will have mercy on him with guidance and justice in religion. And whoever sees that someone is giving him a solution, especially if that person dies, then God will bestow upon him money, whether it is A lot or a little. If a person sees that there is a very black man who is making up, this does not indicate kindness, because this man can suffer from disasters. Either he will have a dispute in his home or boycott his family. Interpretation of a man’s visionIf a man sees himself wearing black eyeliner in a dream This may mean that he will marry a good wife and turn a blind eye to all women. But if a married man sees himself wearing kohl, this indicates that problems will occur between him and his wife, and he will marry another. And if someone sees that he is disfigured and blind, this indicates the presence of an enemy for him. It harms him a lot in his life and steals his money or takes something precious and valuable from his heart. Interpretation of the individual’s vision: If an unmarried woman sees herself wearing a coach in a dream, this means that she will marry a good man who will make her happy and love her very much. And if he sees a divorced or widow wearing a lot of black kohl or She wears antimony, which indicates that she will marry a man who will help her in life and who loves her very much. Interpretation of a dream about eyeliner for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself wearing black eyeliner, the love between her and her husband will increase, and God will guide her husband and keep him away from sin if he commits sin, and God will bless their home. With love and happiness. If a woman sees in her dream that she is wearing blood or ashes, this indicates hatred, and if she is unmarried, then she will meet a deceitful person. But if the woman is married and her eyes are covered with blood and ashes, this indicates problems between her and her husband, or problems between her and her family. Her husband, and these problems can be very significant and lead to separation between them. Husband. Seeing eyeliner in a pregnant woman’s dream. If a pregnant woman dreams of wearing black eyeliner, this indicates that she is pregnant with a boy. However, if a pregnant woman sees that she is wearing ash, this indicates that her mother may stumble a little, and God knows best.

preview.html: Orphan: someone whose father has died, or who has lost his mother, needs someone to take care of him and take care of him at a time when people may ignore him, as each of them is busy with his own affairs and what. It means that he loses everything he sees in clothes, money, and benefits... Below we will present an article about the orphan. An article about the orphanWho is an orphan? An orphan is someone who has lost his father or mother, while an orphan has lost both of his parents and his parents consider him an orphan. Like the Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, the origin of the orphan is: tudla, and it was said: the child is an orphan. Meaning: A child is born from his father, so losing a father is a dangerous matter for the children because he is their breadwinner, and the main reason is to feed them, earn a living, clothe them, and provide for them. The burden of raising it and bearing responsibility for it. The Prophet, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, said in the noble hadith: The loss of a father causes inconvenience that does not affect the home, but the orphan can be relieved by the presence of a guardian or sponsor who takes the father’s place in matters of caring for the orphan, and bears his responsibility. He keeps his money until they are as hard as possible, which brings him a great reward. The Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, said in the noble hadith: An orphan is legally defined as someone whose father died when he was young and did not reach adulthood. The status of an orphan continues until he reaches puberty. According to what the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: “His wet dream has not yet been completed.” Narrated by Abu Dawud and the Horses. An article about the orphan. The commandments of God Almighty and orphans in the Holy Qur’an. God Almighty mentioned the orphan in his precious book in several verses, recommending him, and explaining, may God have mercy on him, in it as compensation for orphans. Among them is the saying of the Most High: (And when We made a covenant with the Children of Israel, “You shall worship God and the God of your father and your neighbors and your neighbors.” [Al-Baqarah: 83] God Almighty entrusted our master Muhammad with the orphan, and asked him to take care of him and love him after reminding him of his condition and his care Then God Almighty said: As for the orphan, do not give up. Al-Duha: 9]For his part, the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, loved orphans and recommended them. According to Abu Hurairah, a man complained to the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, about the hardness of his heart, and he said: Narrated by Ahmad.) Do not approach the orphan’s wealth except for goodness until he reaches maturity. Its peak (and the verse: Whoever consumes an orphan’s wealth will eat fire unjustly in their bellies) and the immunities of God Almighty here in order to protect the orphan. And his money is to take care of their rights and preserve them until they reach their peak, because eating an orphan like him eats fire. God Almighty said: And they ask you about the orphans, so say to them a kind greeting, and if you intervene with them, then they are your brothers. [Al-Baqarah: 220] Meaning: You mix your food with the food of the orphans and mix your drink with their food. (Ibn Kathir in his interpretation). God Almighty said: They ask you what they spent. They say: What did you spend on parents, relatives, orphans, and people? [Al-Baqarah: 215] Here God Almighty referred to the right of the orphan to take some zakat or zakat from the rich and the left to spend. God Almighty said: Everything that the people of the villages gave to His Messenger, God the Messenger, relatives, orphans, and the poor. [Al-Hashr: 7] God Almighty has made loving the orphan and feeding him one of the characteristics of the believers. The Almighty said: And they feed food according to His love, and the poor, and the orphans, and the captives. [Al-Insan: 8] God Almighty rebuked the ignorant person for not honoring the orphan, and said: No.
